alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 04 at 5:12AM CST until January 06 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches expected with a localized band of 8 to 12 inches possible. * WHERE...Southern Nebraska Panhandle including Scottsbluff, Bridgeport, Harrisburg, Kimball, and Sidney. The most favored area for heavier snowfall is expected to be over Scotts Bluff and Banner counties. * WHEN...Wednesday and Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions possible due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in falling snow. Bitterly cold temperatures are also likely Wednesday night into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill; Scotts Bluff
